comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Owen_Seaman Sir Owen Seaman, 1st Baronet (18 September 1861 - 2 February 1936) was a British writer, journalist and poet. He is best known as editor of Punch, from 1906 to 1932.

comment.author: 36645048@N00
comment._content: One thing he definitely wasn't was "Lord". From 1914 he was Sir Owen Seaman Kt, from 1933 he was Sir Owen Seaman Bt.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks Richard Arthur Norton and Heraldic Tyger for the information.  We will add some to the image description.
